definition: lit. to drool with desire (idiom)/fig. to hunger for/greedy
to wish for/to desire/variant of 慾|欲[yu4]

sentences.english: The pies in the store window made my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 店鋪櫥窗裏擺的餡餅我饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The delicious smell of the beef made my mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 牛肉的香味使我饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The list of ingredients sounds very appetizing.
sentences.chinese: 這張單子上列的配料聽起來使人饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: He raised his head , with a look of unrestrained greed in his covetous eyes .
sentences.chinese: 他擡起頭來，一對貪婪的眼光露出饞涎欲滴的神情。
那條狗饞涎欲滴地等着喫。

sentences.english: The dog drooled over his meat.
sentences.chinese: 這條狗對狗食饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The pies in the store window made Little Tommy's mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 店鋪櫥窗裏擺的餡餅使小湯米饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: My mouth had often watered at the sight of them.
sentences.chinese: 過去我每見蘆筍，常常饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The pies in the store window made Little Tommys mouth water.
sentences.chinese: 店鋪櫥窗裏擺的餡餅使小湯米饞涎欲滴。

sentences.english: The vision of the table loaded with food made our mouths water.
sentences.chinese: 瞥見桌上堆滿了食品使咱們饞涎欲滴。
